info.title: Activate a tab in a tab list in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSecondTab
setupScript.description: sets focus on the second tab
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the second tab
testPageDocument.querySelector('#agnes').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, activate the tab.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Agnes Obel' tab, activate the tab.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: State of the tab, 'selected', is conveyed
